entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early in the afternoon except snow inland late in the afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow after midnight and ending before morning then partly cloudy. Snow inland in the evening and after midnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snowfall amount 5 cm except 10 cm inland. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
